H0.text: Which African country's capital is named after an American president. Ghana

H1.text: Which African country's capital is named after an American president. Egypt

H2.text: Which African country's capital is named after an American president. South Africa

H3.text: Which African country's capital is named after an American president. Liberia

A4.text: Monrovia is named in honor of U.S. President James Monroe, a prominent supporter of the colonization of Liberia and the ACS.

A5.text: In 1824, the city was renamed Monrovia after James Monroe, president of the United States at the time.
